title: The Antichrist: Is He a Real Person?
text:
Thursday, January 18, 2018 18:22
 
I have had a few interesting conversations with people from different walks of life about the antichrist. I really like to hear what people perceive and believe about the end times. Since I am a lover of eschatology, I am always ready for a good discussion, always praying for an opportunity to share the gospel of Christ!
Is the antichrist a man or a computer? This is actually a great question. Let’s look at the scriptures to see what God says.
2 Thessalonians 2:1-4 “Now, we request you, brethren, with regard to the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ and our gathering together to Him, that you not be quickly shaken from your composure or be disturbed either by a spirit or a message or a letter as if from us, to the effect that the day of the Lord has come. Let no one in any way deceive you, for it will not come unless the apostasy comes first, and the man of lawlessness is revealed, the son of destruction, who opposes and exalts himself above every so-called God or object of worship so that he takes his seat in the temple of God, displaying himself as being God.”
The scripture here refers to the antichrist as a man, a lawless one at that, and the son of destruction. He will destroy many lives during his reign. He also exalts himself above all so- called gods and our God, and takes a seat in the third Jewish temple to be worshipped.
Sounds like a human to me. Let’s look further!
The book of Daniel in chapter 8 also speaks of this man, the antichrist. In Daniel’s vision, given to him by God of the latter days, it says starting in verse 23:
“In the latter period of their rule, when the transgressors have run their course, a king will arise, insolent and skilled in intrigue. His power will be mighty, but not by his own power, and he will destroy to an extraordinary degree and prosper and perform his will. He will destroy mighty men and the holy people. Through his shrewdness he will cause deceit to succeed by influence. He will magnify himself in his heart. He will destroy many while they are at ease. He will even oppose the Prince of Princes, but he will be broken without human agency” (Daniel 8:23-25).
Let’s recap these human attributes:
1) He is living in the end times.
2) He will be a king or leader of a country; scripture hints he will rise to power suddenly.
3) Insolent: this means rude, disrespectful, contemptuous.
4) Skilled in intrigue, he will wow people (and have many likes on Facebook). But he will have a dark, sinister side that will be fleshed out. He is a liar.
5) He will be mighty with the power of Satan and all those who align themselves with him.
6) He will destroy and kill all who oppose him – the tribulation saints and Jews who refuse to take his mark on their hand and forehead.
7) He will magnify himself in his heart. History repeats itself. Satan did this and look what happened.
8) He will destroy many while they are at ease. He confirms a peace covenant with Israel and then breaks it. He does it for his own purpose and plan. He does not know peace, only destruction.
9) He comes against the Prince of Princes, the Lord Jesus Christ. He loses, of course! Please read Revelation for this overwhelming victory of the Lamb!
10) Broken without human agency. This means he did not die by the hands of another person. This could mean sickness or an accident. In this case, he is slain by Jesus. Read the details in Revelation!
Daniel was exhausted and sick for days after this vision!
This does not sound like a robot or a computer image. This is a flesh and blood human being, a man, a very bad man possessed by Satan and allowed by God, during a specific point in time, to do these things. The Bible speaks of this; Jesus speaks of this to his disciples in the gospels in Matthew 24.
The phrase “abomination of desolation” is giving the reader of this passage a clue to who this person is! He emphasizes for the reader to have understanding. He wants the reader to read the book of Daniel so you know the context of what he is saying. The antichrist is the abomination of desolation. They are one and the same.
This person is a real person; and when he is seen in the holy place, the third temple, the Jewish remnant must flee from his presence—a don’t look back, grab the babies, we are out of here now, pray there is no snow on the mountains of Israel as you flee to them, kind-of-flee!
I see in the above scripture of 2 Thessalonians that we may have a glimpse of this man before the rapture. I have definitely seen the apostasy spoken of, characteristic of the last days, here and now. I know we are close.
But I know my Jesus, and I can’t wait to hear the trumpet to come on up! My husband and children, grandchildren with me!!
Sally Law

Sally you have picked a topic that almost all Bible scholars argue over ! A good topic because as tge end nears the book of Daniel will u fold to revel its self . Looking at this verse I see as the prophecies begin unfolding one after another then get ready redemption is near ready to take you out ! Now in KJV 2Thessalonians 2:4-10 we find when this wicked one will be reveled . It is after this person is removed , then the wicked one shall be reveled . Who is this person ? Here comes something you probably have never heard before . How can Jesus be the Prince of Princes and be the King of Kings at tge same time  ? Many will say He is both . True He  can be both but He is not both ! In Ezekiel chapters 44 and 46 we are told about this Prince who enters the eastern gate and offers sacrifaces the LORD OF HOSTS ( the Projection of the ANCIENT OF DAYS – GOD YHVH )  . No man can look upon GOD’s face and live . Moses only got to see GOD’s back . But then we find that he took 70 elders up to meet GOD . Books of Isaiah , Ezekiel and Jeremiah we find that there is GOD YHVH , THE LORD OF HOSTS and the son of man . In the book of Job GOD says HE hides HIMSELF in thick dark clouds . And that only a select few Angels are allowed to be in HIS presence . The others are given a projection of GOD HIMSELF as THE LORD OF HOSTS which seems as the book of Enoch stated the angels are on different levels . Now the book of John tells us that Jesus was GOD become flesh . We are also told that Jesus was virgin born and as the book of Genesis stated the seed of woman . Did Jesus have an earthly father ? No ! Ok then how can He be called the son of man ? In the book of Ezekiel GOD calls Ezekiel son of man many times in his book . Ok what does  that mean , he is a being born by the sperm seed of man .  Every human born by mans injection into the woman’s womb is a son of man or daughter of man ! I’ve got to inject this in order for you to see the real picture . The vatican in 325 AD took the books or scrolls and decided which ones were to be put together to be called the Bible . Get ready ! Here it comes  ! They are descendants of Esau the brother of Jacob . In Malachi 1:1-4 GOD states HE hates them . Their  linage HE promises to totally destroy .  The Bible has books that contradict each other which the vatican put together for their benefit  . Example , Matthew and Luke contradict each other on Jesus linage . Some say one is Mary’s linage , not so ! It plainly tells us that Joseph is Jesus father in both of them . But from King David down to Jesus both contradict each other . One uses Nathan’s ( King David’s son ) linage , the other uses Solomon’s ( King David’s son )  linage . Then all the names to Joseph contradict each other . So which one is right , neither one ! Joseph is not Jesus father !!! So being virgin born without mans sperm , Mary comes into play . She is not of the tribe of Judea . Elisabeth was her couin who was married to the High Preist . Elisabeth by GOD’s law must also be a Levite . Mary then being her cousin was a Levite as was Jesus our High Preist of the Levitical Tribe . Huston we have problems here ! To fulfill prophecies the son of man Jesus spoke about must be of King David’s sperm seed . Jesus said and you shall see the sign of the son of man coming in the clouds with glory and great power  . Matthew 24:30-31 Jesus says and He shall send His angels to gather His elect . In all the other verses Jesus uses I , Me and Mine speaking of Himself . Who is He speaking of ? Jesus is not a son of man , He is a son of woman . So how does this son of man get angels to gather the elect ? The book of Daniel states He was called up before the ANCIENT OF DAYS and was given Power , Glory and a Kingdom . And He was sent back to earth . In the old testament we are told many times this son of man or sometimes called son of David will lead the elect in the wilderness near mount Zion and will feed them , protect them and teach them . When the earth goes thru many perils one is the time of darkness . The Bible states that on tgem will be light continuely . Let’s back up here ! The son of man comes in the clouds to gather the elect . Who are the elect ? In Revelation 3:7-10 we are told that the church of Philadelphia will be protected when everyone else is going thru the tribulation period ( all the other churches that played patti cake with GOD go thru the tribulation ) . They must prove their love for GOD ! So Matthew 24:29-31 is the church elect of Philadelphia ( church of Love and paientce and keeping of GOD’s word ) . Wait ? That’s it ? The elect are the only ones removed ? There seems to be times between the leaving of the elect and the resserrection of the dead that possibly some are removed that have proven their Love for GOD . Here comes the biggest one yet . I will tell you when the resserrection will take place , The scriptures tell us plainly . Revelation 20:5-6 tells you exactually when the ressurrection of the first rising of the dead takes place , just before the 1000 year reign of Christ . Now let’s throw in more sticks into the fire . Christ in Hebrew is an anointed man called by GOD to do a certin job and given HIS anointing to do this job . Jesus was a totally different being , being He was the son of woman . Was He a man ? He looked like a man , acted like a man but as Ron Wyatt who found the Ark of the Covenant under Jesus cross and Jesus blood that leaked down the crack which was caused by the earthquake and dropping on to the mercy seat , Jesus chromosomes only had 23 and not 46 like the rest of the human race . 23 come from the woman and 23 come from the man .  When tested Jesus chromosomes were only of the woman . Was He a man ? John chapter 1 states HE GOD became flesh so that mankind could handle him and touch him . Here is something to ponder . Ezekiel chapters 44 and 46 tells us that the Prince will have children , bring back GOD’s  Sabbath ( Saturday ) worship and offer sacrifaces . Is this something to remind Him of His frailty as He wields GOD ‘s power to use as He wishes ?  GOD stated in the old testament the Sabbath is forever . In the old testament we are told that the son of man will rule with a rod of iron here on earth . We are not going to Heaven ! Heaven is coming to us as Revelation21 and 22 states . Durning the 1000 year reign of King David’s descendnt , He will bring all nations back into subjection to GOD ! They must go to Jerusalem once a year to worship the LORD OF HOSTS ( GOD’s projection of HIMSELF ) . After everything is finished then GOD YHVH will bring Heaven from As the book of Job states from the constellation Orion where GOD resides in the north sky to earth to dwell with the righteous forever on planet earth . HE will be their KING ( YESHUA ) . And the son of David will be the Prince . In Heaven there is no marrying and giving in marriage where it is located now  . But on planet earth the scriptures tell us that we shall fill the universe with our seed . Of all the people ever born should they come to life  would not fill the universe . We are going to continue to have children . The Prince will have children . No floating in the clouds or off in some fantasy land . In the book of  Pslams we are told the earth was built to be forever . So the clean up  at the end of Revelation stating new Heaven and New earth , means a make over a redo . the story you have heard is from the vatican . To know which books belong to GOD do a search on Bible Code . Only certain books in the Bible contain this code of history naming names of people  and places and their accomplishments . An interesting search is ( Free Bible Code Search or http://www.biblecodewisdom.com ) . Type in your name and see how many places in the Bible your name appears . If you use these words they may tell you no answer found . The sky is the limit with your searches . But first look up ( discovery of Bible Code ) to get an understanding of how to use the Bible Code Search . It had 911 , Kennedy’s death and where he was shot from . It’s very hard to use it to predict the future . But after it has happened and you know the facts then you can type in the answers and see GOD who for knew had HIS prophets write their books in exact order not changing one letter or word . If changed it screws up the whole book and the code is null and void in that book – like Isaiah or Ezekiel   . What an AWSOME GOD we serve  ! With this code you can know which books GOD approves of and is HIS dictation to HIS prophets . The only gospel out of the four in the new Testament with the Bible code is the book of John . The others were written about or over 150 years after Jesus and was handed down traditions . John was the disciple Jesus loved and was the only disciple at the foot of the cross with Mary .

He was presented on tv to the entire world.  He will retain the physical attributes of the age of 33.  He will not age anymore.  His wife will age, but not him.
He is not great looking, but he is charming and has a lot of charisma at first.  Then he changes after he gets shot in the head.
He is already amongst world leaders and hosting his share of the ‘parties’. He is from Europe, but he has been on the continent of North America many times.  His mother wanted to take him and his brother to live in America, but that was prevented from happening.  He has a Castle in the clouds in Montana now though. It’s on the top of a big mountain.  There are 3 mountains in the mountain chain. If I had to guess which mountain, I would say the middle one.
He will rise to power suddenly when he kills his father (or has him killed).  You won’t know it was he who killed or had his father killed.  His father, heir to the throne, would have been king before him.  Can’t have that now. Can we?  This can happen any time now though.  There will be a family wedding in late spring so this will be after that.
We may not have a facebook by the time he comes to ‘visible’ power as the antichrist himself, nor have computers. HOWEVER…………you will see him become King.  He has 2 children at this moment and one due this spring, I believe.  Super babies created in a lab dish.  According to prophecy, it will be another girl.
He will have 3 children in all (3 for the satanic trinity of saytn, antichrist, and false prophet).
He will be the antichrist for 8 years because he will be in a coma for 1 year.  While he’s in a coma, his wife tells him she will keep things going for him until he comes out of the coma.  Gullible people will believe he’s God because they were told he was dead and then they suddenly see him alive.  They think he rose from the dead.
He will not be slain by Jesus Christ.  He will be slain by St. Michael, the Archangel.
Revelations was not written by inspiration of the Holy Ghost to the Apostles. Revelations was written by jews.
Read the Apocalypse.  That was written by one of the 4 evangelist apostles.  Forgive me if memory alludes me these days.
Hope this helps to clear some things up.
